mapper.insert: insert ccer_projects(user_id, project_name, project_type, location, status, registration_date, valid_until) values(1, #{projectName}, #{projectType}, #{location}, '进行中', DATE_FORMAT(#{registrationDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{validUntil}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
insert into ccer_project_emission_reductions(project_id, `year`, reduction_amount, verification_date) values(#{projectId}, #{year}, #{reductionAmount}, DATE_FORMAT(#{verificationDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
insert into ccer_project_monitoring_reports(project_id, report_date, report_details) values(#{projectId}, DATE_FORMAT(#{reportDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{reportDetails})

insert into ccer_project_registration_info(project_id, registration_number, issuing_authority, issue_date) values(#{projectId}, #{registrationNumber}, #{issuingAuthority}, DATE_FORMAT(#{issueDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'))

insert into ccer_project_transactions(project_id, buyer, seller, transaction_date, quantity, price_per_unit, total_amount) values(#{projectId}, #{buyer}, #{seller}, DATE_FORMAT(#{transactionDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{quantity}, #{pricePerUnit}, #{totalAmount})
mapper.select: select project_id, project_name, project_type, location, status, registration_date, valid_until from ccer_projects
select project_type, count(1) as projectAmount from ccer_projects group by project_type
select project_type, sum(reduction_amount) as projectReductionAmount from ccer_projects pro join ccer_project_emission_reductions emi where pro.project_id = emi.project_id group by project_type

select cp.project_id, project_name, project_type, status, location, registration_date, valid_until, year, reduction_amount, verification_date, report_date, report_details, registration_number, issuing_authority, issue_date, buyer, seller, transaction_date, quantity, price_per_unit, total_amount from ccer_projects cp join ccer_project_emission_reductions cper on cp.project_id = cper.project_id join ccer_project_monitoring_reports cpmr on cp.project_id = cpmr.project_id join ccer_project_registration_info cpri on cp.project_id = cpri.project_id join ccer_project_transactions cpt on cp.project_id = cpt.project_id

select project_id from ccer_projects where project_name = #{projectName} and project_type = #{projectType} and location = #{location} and status = '进行中' and registration_date = DATE_FORMAT(#{registrationDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and valid_until = DATE_FORMAT(#{validUntil}, '%Y-%m-%d')
